#summary Compatible weather stations.

= Introduction =

The [http://fowsr.googlecode.com/files/2009526181448.zip EasyWeather] PC-application is used to check compatibility.


= Details =

The [http://fowsr.googlecode.com/files/2009526181448.zip EasyWeather] application can read weather data from all weather stations compatible with *fowsr*. The latest version is available from the Fine Offset Electronic's [http://www.foshk.com/en/products/show.asp?id=42 web site]. 

If the [http://fowsr.googlecode.com/files/2009526181448.zip EasyWeather] application can read your weather station, then the *fowsr* application will work. The [http://fowsr.googlecode.com/files/2009526181448.zip EasyWeather] software is also needed to configure the weather station's read interval, time zone and relative pressure.
